name: Mary dreams of the Sea
description:
A game made by @PythagoRascal @hdrichard and @DudetteAlex, part of the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018 - 'GENRE, but you can't MECHANIC'.

We introduce to you 'Mary dreams of the Sea', a racing game made with Unity 3D. Mary's ultimate goal is to reach the sea on her hovercraft.. the only problem is, she can't accelerate with her vehicle. So she faces two choices - either moving at full speed or not moving at all. 

NOTE: WE ARE CURRENTLY FIXING BUGS
